Anthony Badea
  • About
  • CV

I am a particle physicist working on the ATLAS experiment at the Large Hadron Collider in Geneva, Switzerland. I build hardware, lead analyses, and develop machine learning algorithms to answer questions about the universe.

I am a Schmidt AI in Science Postdoctoral Fellow at the Enrico Fermi Institute, University of Chicago. I received my Ph.D. in physics from Harvard University in 2023 and dual B.S. in physics and mathematics from MIT in 2019.
Anthony Badea - University of Chicago
